caption: This photograph captures an older woman holding a pair of goggles in her hands. She is examining or cleaning them with a white cloth. The woman has dark hair styled in a bouffant manner and is wearing large, dark, rounded sunglasses. Her attire includes a light yellow or cream-colored top. The background is somewhat dark and indistinct, possibly an indoor setting with subdued lighting, emphasizing the subject. The expression on the woman's face shows focus and perhaps a bit of curiosity or scrutiny as she looks at the goggles. The image exudes a sense of careful attention and perhaps preparation for an activity requiring the use of these goggles.
title: Antonelli Industries, Rifle, a ski goggles factory, employs fourteen workers most of whom are farm wives.
